The vertex int64_t attribute which is used for deciding if an edge should be split.

List of edge int64_t attributes that are used as filter. Only if all given edge labels are present, an edge is considered for a split. If no edge labels are given, every edge is considered for splitting.
Name of the edge int64_t attribute that is used as filter.

The label that is assigned to new vertices emerging from a split, i.e. vertices that are on the isosurface.
